title: Nizza Hi RF Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
The adidas Nizza sneaker has come a long way since its time on the hardwood. It's made waves at skate parks, made a name in fashion, and now it's part of our efforts to help end plastic waste. For this high top pair we collaborated with Parley for the Oceans, using innovative materials that help us move towards the future.

This shoe's upper is made with a technical yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — upcycled plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester. Scan the QR code on your product to find out more about the story behind how it was created.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Crew Red / Wonder White / Wonder White; Product code: GX4585
colors: Crew Red / Wonder White / Wonder White

title: Adizero Afterburner 8 Cleats
subtitle: Men's Baseball
description:
Light on weight, long on comfort. These adidas baseball cleats are tailored for speed. The Sprintskin upper delivers elevated support, while the Lightstrike midsole offers superlight cushioning, relieving cleat pressure to keep you flying.

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.
details: Lace closure; Sprintskin upper; Lightweight; Textile upper; Lightstrike midsole; Cleated synthetic outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Team Light Grey; Product code: H00971
colors: Royal Blue / Cloud White / Cloud White

title: adidas Racer TR x LEGO® Shoes
subtitle: Infant & Toddler Training
description:
Inventive little minds will appreciate these toddlers' adidas shoes built with LEGO® studs at the heel. And when your little one kicks up their feet, they'll show off the colorful LEGO® bricks that add grip to the outsole. A soft lining provides added warmth, so they're great for outdoor play.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Elastic lace closure with hook-and-loop strap; Textile upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; LEGO® rubber outsole pod; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Ecru Tint / Bahia Orange / Red; Product code: GW4003
colors: Ecru Tint / Bahia Orange / Red

title: NMD_V3 Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
The day is yours to own. Don't hesitate. Step into these juniors' adidas NMD_V3 Shoes and get after it. Building on a line that's always been about progress, they bring next-level comfort to your feet with a responsive BOOST midsole and a snug textile upper. The transparent details? Those add a little touch of futuristic style to keep your look sharp. So go ahead. Get out there. Explore. See what you can create.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black; Product code: GX5683
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

title: Stan Smith ADV Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: Few silhouettes stand out with simplicity like the Stan Smith. Adopted by street skaters in the '90s for its functionality and style, the Stan Smith ADV adds tongue wings for a secure fit, grippy soft rubber cupsole construction, and a hidden ollie protection beneath the premium leather upper. The result is classic Stan Smith style, with a fit and feel retooled for skateboarding.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Smooth leather upper with ollie protection; Soft feel; Leather lining; Grippy rubber cupsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Green; Product code: GX9753
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

title: Five Ten Niad Lace Climbing Shoes
subtitle: Men's Five Ten
description: Face or crack. Granite or sandstone. The adidas Five Ten Niad is a time-tested and all-around classic climbing shoe. Versatile Stealth® C4™ rubber edges, grips and smears across all surfaces, indoors and out. The form fit heel and stiff midsole provide a positive feel. Lined uppers enhance comfort out of the box.
details: Snug fit; Lace closure; Lined polyester upper; Form fit heel; Stiff midsole; Stealth® C4 rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Crew Red / Acid Mint; Product code: FW2851

title: Campus 80s Sporty & Rich Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: A collaboration with LA-based lifestyle label Sporty & Rich, these shoes pay homage to an adidas icon by hacking the classic Campus 80s aesthetic without neglecting its core identity. The vintage-inspired design is crafted with a premium, soft nubuck upper and lined with smooth satin. Sporty & Rich and adidas logos in different executions of print and metallic-gold finishes can be found throughout. A Sporty & Rich Wellness Club key chain with pearl straps completes the premium look. Everything comes in special archive-inspired packaging.
details: Nubuck upper; Satin lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Collegiate Burgundy / Chalk White / Collegiate Burgundy; Product code: HQ6074

title: Terrex Snow COLD.RDY Winter Boots
subtitle: Children TERREX
description:
Snowy days are part of winter's magic. Kids can get outside and explore in the comfort of these adidas winter boots. PrimaLoft® insulation and COLD.RDY hold in the warmth, and RAIN.RDY sheds water. So feet stay warm and dry, and kids stay out as long as they like.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure with hook-and-loop top strap; Synthetic upper with reflective details; PrimaLoft® insulation; RAIN.RDY and insulating COLD.RDY; Lightweight EVA midsole; Traxion outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Shadow Maroon / Wonder Red / Pulse Lilac; Product code: GY6773

They bring a race-day quality to training, with a propulsive feel that comes from ENERGYRODS, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability — the midsole mixes ultra-light Lightstrike Pro cushioning with durable Lightstrike EVA.

description:
Go far, and feel good doing it. Get the most out of your long runs with these adidas running shoes designed for optimal support. The dual-density midsole provides a soft, cushioned landing, with plenty of rocker to propel you forward. Firmer foam in the heel protects and stabilizes the foot, while an internal wrap gives a locked-in feel. The engineered mesh upper combines targeted stability zones with maximum breathability that feels good from start to finish.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description: When the adidas Superstar shoes broke into basketball, they totally changed the game. They were the first leather low tops the court had ever seen, and their shell-toe style gained fans fast. Next up, skaters, rebels and hip-hop royalty adopted the design and took it to city streets. Culture would never be the same. Back today in all of their OG-inspired glory, this pair keeps things fresh with new colors. Now you can write your own chapter of the story.

description:
If you're looking for a running shoe that can elevate any outfit, the adidas by Stella McCartney Solarglide Running Shoes might just be it.

The lightweight Primeknit upper made in part with recycled materials will keep your feet snug on any run around 10k. The striking speed-inspired cage is made from bio-based EVA. The cage is built to give you extra support with every step, and it gives the shoes their characteristic Stella McCartney look. 

Whether you wear these shoes when you go for a run or throughout your day, you'll feel energized with every step thanks to the flexible outsole and BOOST midsole. They complete any outfit as a statement piece.

description: When it comes to the adidas Superstar shoes, little to no introduction is needed. Started on the basketball court, made even more famous on hip-hop stages, found just about everywhere else after that… you know the story. Lace into these rubber-shell-toe sneakers and join the legacy. They're all about carving your own path — evident from all the people and places they've found themselves on and in. So when you step out in these shoes, you're joining the footsteps of all the game-changers and rule-breakers who came before.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; OrthoLite® sockliner; Rubber midsole and outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Green; Product code: GW2161

description: Show your colors. Worn by adidas athletes at the southern hemisphere's premier tournament, these tennis shoes are part of a vibrant collection highlighting the consequences of climate change. Their intuitive lacing system combines with gap-filling heel Sensepods to help you feel at one with your footwear. Underneath, a cushioned Bounce midsole and TPU midfoot shank add comfort and stability.
details: Adaptive lacing system; Textile upper; Torsion System; Geofit Sensepods; Bounce midsole; Adiwear outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Ecru Tint / Beam Yellow / Almost Yellow; Product code: GY1448
colors: Core Black / Silver Metallic / Solar Red

description:
Running may not be your favorite sport, but it makes you better at the ones you love. These juniors' running shoes add some fun to your training runs thanks to adidas 4D, a 3D-printed midsole with an unparalleled combination of cushioning and stability. The angled heel cradle guides your foot forward and reduces impact with the ground for a smooth, comfortable ride.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; adidas 4D midsole; Textile lining; Weight: 11.7 ounces (size 9); Midsole drop: 11 mm (heel: 22 mm / forefoot: 11 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Shadow Navy / Matt Purple Met. / Almost Blue; Product code: GX9765
colors: Shadow Navy / Matt Purple Met. / Almost Blue

description:
Built for the positionless basketball player, these adidas shoes suit the athlete that wants to do it all on the court. The upper has prototype design lines to give it a unique, factory-like design. Lightstrike cushioning reacts to every move you make on the court without weighing you down. The tread pattern on the outsole gives you traction when you change directions or stop on a dime for that pull-up jumper.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Mesh upper with leather eyestay overlay; Textile lining; Chunky sculpted midsole; Lightstrike cushioning; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Grey Two / Core Black / Cloud White; Product code: GY8983
colors: Grey Two / Cloud White / Core Black

description:
When comfort is your number-one priority, these adidas shoes deliver. They wrap your feet in it, from the pockets of foam in the lining to the foam upper. They look good too. Design from the archives combines with modern influences to keep things simple, sleek and super versatile. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Foam upper; Foam pockets in lining; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Legend Ink / Legend Ink / Solar Red; Product code: HP6476
colors: Legend Ink / Legend Ink / Solar Red

description:
They're fascinated by the world around them. Make that world even more magical with this toddlers' version of the classic adidas Superstar Shoes. Flip up the sequin 3-Stripes to reveal rainbow colors on the other side. A rainbow decal adds an extra touch of brightness to their day. A snug fit with hook-and-loop straps and an OrthoLite® sockliner ensure that their feet will be comfy all day long.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste
details: Regular fit; Hook-and-loop straps; Synthetic leather upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Adifit length-measuring insole; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Pulse Blue / Pantone; Product code: GV9012

description: City wandering calls for technical gear too. That's why these adidas shoes borrow from the world of outdoor design and push to the future with an innovative gaiter system. The protective feature attaches easily with FIDLOCK® magnetic snaps and goes far towards keeping debris away from your feet. Add to that a durable CORDURA® upper, rugged outsole and speed-lace closure, and you're ready to roam.
details: Lace closure; CORDURA® nylon upper; Textile lining; Detachable outer gaiter with FIDLOCK® magnetic snap; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Golden Beige / Chalky Brown / Golden Beige; Product code: HQ6071

description: The Orketro Shoes look to lightweight '90s running shoes and brutalism for design inspiration. This confluence of references combines to push the classic running silhouette in a new, futuristic direction. The asymmetrical design is crafted from a mix of mesh and suede with metallic leather details, and rests on a premium rubber outsole. The shoes are signed off with Trefoil and Orketro branding on the tongue.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Mesh and suede upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Pyrite / Pyrite / Mesa; Product code: GX3133
colors: Bright Blue / Carbon / Core Black

description:
Serve for the oceans. Part of an adidas collection created for the world's most famous grass court tournament, these Avacourt tennis shoes put the spotlight on plastic waste. Crafted for the women's game, they have a lightweight mesh upper and female-specific midfoot support. Under that, the Bounce Pro midsole works hard to keep you stable and comfortable, shot after shot.

Educate and act. Head to Parley for the Oceans website to find out more, sign up and get involved at adidas.com/parley. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Bounce Pro midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Mint Ton / Cloud White / Orbit Grey; Product code: GX6333
